BackstoryDef.title: space explorer
BackstoryDef.description: In one adventure after another, [PAWN_nameDef] always learns a lot.

BackstoryDef.title: bounty hunter
BackstoryDef.description: In the remote regions of the Star Empire, chaos and violence reign supreme. [PAWN_nameDef] is a bounty hunter roaming this chaotic land. [PAWN_pronoun] will do anything for you if you pay him enough.

BackstoryDef.title: dragon rider
BackstoryDef.description: Legend has it that long ago, the ancestors of astrologers once ruled this star region alongside the great dragon of the sky. There are also vague records of this in fragments of epic poetry, but these are all stories that cannot be verified.

BackstoryDef.title: researcher
BackstoryDef.description: On every planet in the Star Empire, there are numerous research institutes, both private and public. [PAWN_nameDef] is an employee at one of these institutes.

BackstoryDef.title: agent
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is an elusive agent known for [PAWN_possessive] ability to obtain intelligence.

BackstoryDef.title: serving soldier
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a soldier. After undergoing physical training, shooting, and combat training, [PAWN_pronoun] was finally allowed to wear the uniform of an astrologer.

BackstoryDef.title: ace pilot
BackstoryDef.description: There have been many geniuses like you in this era, and I have brought them all down. [PAWN_nameDef] once served in the Star Empire Space Force. [PAWN_pronoun] was an undisputed ace.

BackstoryDef.title: veteran
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had crossed streams stained red with blood, walked across battlefields strewn with blood and flesh, and climbed out of trenches piled with corpses. Years of war had changed [PAWN_pronoun].

BackstoryDef.title: friendship princess
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] claims to possess friendship magic, and [PAWN_pronoun] claims to be able to unleash a powerful force upon the souls of five like-minded companions.

BackstoryDef.title: last socialite
BackstoryDef.description: Years later, facing the huge crowds of people, [PAWN_nameDef] would remember that distant afternoon when [PAWN_possessive] sister took him to see a concert.

BackstoryDef.title: combat medic
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tends to wounded soldiers on the battlefield, and [PAWN_pronoun] also enjoys striking down enemies.

BackstoryDef.title: mystic
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is obsessed with the mysterious occult. [PAWN_pronoun] dreams of using magic to turn stones into gold so that [PAWN_pronoun] can make a fortune.

BackstoryDef.title: disaster messenger
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] travels between interstellar city-states, primarily bringing news of cosmic disasters to planets with less advanced information systems. For the governments of these planets, the sooner they learn of a disaster, the less damage they will suffer. Therefore, Disaster Messengers generally enjoy exceptionally high treatment and social status among them.

BackstoryDef.title: diplomat
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a diplomat. Due to its vast territory, the Star Empire has a staggering number of diplomats, each of whom carries the Star Empire's diplomatic philosophy of mutual assistance, friendship, and win-win cooperation.

BackstoryDef.title: radiation survivor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a scientific researcher. In a research accident, [PAWN_nameDef] was unfortunately exposed to a large dose of gamma rays. This, however, not only did not kill [PAWN_pronoun], but it actually enhanced [PAWN_pronoun]'s physical strength.

BackstoryDef.title: rich man
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was so rich he didn't know what to do with himself. So [PAWN_pronoun] decided to leave everything behind and go on a spontaneous trip. However, since he had no experience, [PAWN_nameDef]'s trip wasn't going to go smoothly.
